summary:
Monthly Operating Report Summary (June 2025)

Key Operational Highlights:

  • Mass Market Electricity & Gas Sales:
  • 410GWh (vs. 416GWh June 2024)

  • Netback: $146.32/MWh (vs. $126.34/MWh June 2024)

  • Wholesale Business:

  • Contracted electricity sales: 810GWh (vs. 795GWh June 2024)
  • Net revenue: $186.08/MWh (vs. $167.12/MWh June 2024)

  • Unit generation cost (incl. acquired gen): $54.27/MWh (vs. $54.53/MWh June 2024)

  • Otahuhu Futures (ASX 2025 Q4):

  • $138.3/MWh (15 Jul 2025) vs. $133.05/MWh (30 Jun 2025)

  • Hydro Storage (vs. mean):

  • South Island: 95% | North Island: 148% (14 Jul 2025)

Renewable Projects Under Construction:

  • Glenbrook BESS (Q1-CY26, $163m)
  • Kowhai Park Solar (Q2-CY26, $273m, 50/50 JV)
  • Te Mihi Geothermal Stage 2 (Q3-CY27, $712m)

Liquidity & Costs:

  • Unallocated costs for Manawa acquisition: $17.9m (incl. $10.9m transaction costs).

No material capital markets activity or valuation-impacting disclosures identified.

(Data extracted strictly from material operational/financial metrics.)
